timeline.message: 6305 change name of tool to discovery and refactor package name from filequery
6305 add MERGED file back after refactor
6305 first batch of UI changes for Discovery
6305 fix new bug introduced with bug fix of panel never expanding
6305 rework size and data source filter panels
6305 finish implementing abstraction of UI filter panels for images
6305 changes to abstract a bit more code
6305 fix layout a bit for Discovery search UI
6305 adjustments for UI to resize better
6305 layout changes and fixes to allignment
6305 reset filters when case opened or closed
6305 disable size filter for video at start
6305 clean up validation of filter settings
